responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''`` We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' comments Eric Schmidt . By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. `` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' adds Larry Page .`` The results speak for themselves. The decision for Larry Page to take off the CEO training wheels comes at an auspicious moment in the history of Google. I won't overdramatize this step by saying`` Google is at a crossroads'' or The company's future hangs in the balance. But at no time since the Google juggernaut began its conquest of the Internet have their been so many doubts being raised about the company's future. Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
